channel.title: [req] 317 pi combatassistant for 602 anims\gfx
channel.description:
just added 602 gfxs and anims and now all my item wield anims etc are messed up. does anyone have a combatassistant that uses the 602 anims\gfxs wield ids etc? and the fixes for npcs also?
thanks, l0lc0pt3r
